thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-EOG Resources Q4 Earnings Per Share $4.20

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-EOG Resources Q4 Earnings Per Share $4.20
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - EOG Resources Inc:
* EOG RESOURCES REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS AND ANNOUNCES 2018 CAPITAL PROGRAM
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.69
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $4.20 * ‍RAISES COMMON STOCK DIVIDEND 10 PERCENT​ * ‍EXPECTS TO EARN DOUBLE-DIGIT ROCE IN 2018​
* ‍CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FOR 2018 ARE EXPECTED TO RANGE FROM $5.4 TO $5.8 BILLION​
* ‍AT YEAR-END 2017, TOTAL COMPANY NET PROVED RESERVES WERE 2,527 MILLION BARRELS OF OIL EQUIVALENT​
* QTRLY NET OPERATING REVENUES $‍3,340.4​ MILLION VERSUS $2,402 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
